lead_paragraph: The $385 million acquisition of TEN Sports is set to make Sony Pictures Networks a major cricket broadcaster in Asia as it seeks to expand its Twenty20-dominated portfolio.

headline.print_headline: TEN Sports Deal to Make Sony Major Cricket Broadcaster
headline.main: TEN Sports Deal to Make Sony Major Cricket Broadcaster

snippet: The $385 million acquisition of TEN Sports is set to make Sony Pictures Networks a major cricket broadcaster in Asia as it seeks to expand its Twenty20-dominated portfolio....
